permissions.name: Read Organization Info
permissions.description: Read organization membership and public information

operations.name: List Repositories
operations.description: List repositories for the authenticated user

parameters.name: affiliation
parameters.description: Filter by affiliation: owner, collaborator, organization_member (comma-separated). Default: owner,collaborator,organization_member

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by repository type. Default: owner

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

operations.name: Get Repository
operations.description: Get a repository by owner and repo name

operations.name: List Repository Issues
operations.description: List issues for a repository

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Only show issues updated at or after this time (ISO 8601 format).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

operations.name: Get Authenticated User
operations.description: Get information about the authenticated user

operations.name: Create Issue
operations.description: Create an issue in a repository

parameters.name: milestone
parameters.description: Milestone number to associate with the issue

operations.name: Get Issue
operations.description: Get details of a specific issue

parameters.name: issue_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the issue

operations.name: Get Issue Comments
operations.description: List comments on a specific issue

parameters.name: issue_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the issue

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

operations.name: Update Issue
operations.description: Update an existing issue

parameters.name: issue_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the issue

parameters.name: milestone
parameters.description: Milestone number to associate with the issue

operations.name: Create File
operations.description: Create a new file in a repository

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Raw file content (will be base64 encoded)

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch name. Default: repository's default branch

operations.name: Update File
operations.description: Update an existing file in a repository

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Raw file content (will be base64 encoded)

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: Blob SHA of the file being replaced

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch name. Default: repository's default branch

operations.name: Get Repository Content
operations.description: Get the content of a file or directory in a repository

parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: Branch, tag, or commit SHA. Default: repository's default branch

operations.name: Delete File
operations.description: Delete a file from a repository

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: Blob SHA of the file being deleted

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch name. Default: repository's default branch

operations.name: List Commits
operations.description: List commits for a repository

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: SHA or branch to start listing commits from. Default: the repository's default branch

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Only commits containing this file path will be returned.

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: GitHub login or email address by which to filter commits.

parameters.name: committer
parameters.description: GitHub login or email address by which to filter commits.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Only show commits later than or on this date (ISO 8601 format).

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Only show commits earlier than or on this date (ISO 8601 format).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

operations.name: Get Commit
operations.description: Get details of a specific commit

operations.name: List Pull Requests
operations.description: List pull requests for a repository

parameters.name: head
parameters.description: Filter by head user and branch name (user:ref-name)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

operations.name: Get Pull Request
operations.description: Get details of a specific pull request

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the pull request

operations.name: Create Pull Request
operations.description: Create a new pull request

parameters.name: head
parameters.description: The name of the branch where your changes are implemented.

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: The name of the branch you want the changes pulled into.

parameters.name: maintainer_can_modify
parameters.description: Whether maintainers can modify the pull request.

parameters.name: draft
parameters.description: Whether the pull request is a draft.

parameters.name: issue
parameters.description: Issue number to associate with the pull request

operations.name: Update Pull Request
operations.description: Update an existing pull request

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the pull request

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: Change the base branch for the pull request

parameters.name: maintainer_can_modify
parameters.description: Whether maintainers can modify the pull request.

operations.name: Merge Pull Request
operations.description: Merge a pull request

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the pull request

parameters.name: commit_title
parameters.description: Title for the merge commit. Default: PR title + PR number.

parameters.name: commit_message
parameters.description: Body of the merge commit. Default: PR body.

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: SHA that pull request head must match to allow merge.

operations.name: Create Pull Request Review
operations.description: Create a review for a pull request

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the pull request

parameters.name: commit_id
parameters.description: The SHA of the commit that needs a review. Defaults to the head commit.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body text of the review. Required if event is COMMENT or REQUEST_CHANGES.

parameters.name: comments
parameters.description: Array of review comments. Each object needs path, position, body.

operations.name: List Pull Request Reviews
operations.description: List reviews for a pull request

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the pull request

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

operations.name: Delete Git Reference
operations.description: Delete a Git reference (branch or tag)

operations.name: Get Git Reference
operations.description: Get a Git reference (branch or tag information)

parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: The ref to get. Fully qualified (e.g., "refs/heads/main" or "heads/main")

operations.name: Create Git Reference
operations.description: Create a Git reference (branch or tag)

parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: Fully qualified name of the ref, e.g., "refs/heads/new-branch"

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: SHA1 value to set this reference to

operations.name: Get Git Tree
operations.description: Get a Git tree object

operations.name: Get Blob
operations.description: Get a Git blob object (raw file content)

operations.name: Create Blob
operations.description: Create a Git blob object

operations.name: Create Repository From Template
operations.description: Create a new repository from a template repository

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: Owner of the new repository (organization or authenticated user if blank)

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: Whether the new repository should be private

parameters.name: include_all_branches
parameters.description: Whether to include all branches from the template

operations.name: Star Repository
operations.description: Star a repository for the authenticated user

operations.name: Unstar Repository
operations.description: Unstar a repository for the authenticated user
